subtitle: hi this is sim eject obscene and welcome
to meaningful Monday's where we answer
your personal questions the question
this week is a beloved family member has
recently passed away lacking a physical
connection I deeply feel the loss of her
presence I've been drawn to the option
of hiring a medium to try and
communicate with her is it just my grief
talking am I just setting myself up for
ultimate disappointment the brief answer
is yes in desperate times we often
resort to desperate measures that don't
always work for us remember that a soul
always lives on especially in its loved
ones and by trying to escape or running
to mediums or other forms of relief
you're often undermining thats all from
communicating with you and working
through you so the best suggestion is is
to grieve and then learn to build and
build something of your life that is
based on the inspiration and the
strength and courage of the person you
loved instead of trying to find other
ways that are often not even real very
prone to a vulnerable con artist is
anyone that's in a situation like yours
so it's critical in such a fragile
situation to be around loved ones people
who care about you and to find the
strength from within yourself to connect
to the soul as I said which lives on
forever may you be consoled that you
find the strength and may you connected
that soul in a direct way without any
other intermediaries thank you for
watching this has been meaningful
Monday's if you'd like to submit your
personal question please click on the
link below
everyone have very meaningful
you
